game_description: Void Ninja is action platformer with gesture based controls and innovative locomotion. - run, glide, dive and hook - slice and arrow the enemies - randomly generated levels - design your own challenges This version includes additional levels and few game modifiers (press X/A to show the menu). Buy this version if you would like to support the development.
review_1: While the gameplay is good there are more tutorial levels than actual levels and game doesn't show me which ones I've completed So I don't know where to go after I didn't play a while It really needs user created levels or SOMETHING
review_2: A breath of fresh air among the mountains of FPS and AAA titles that are not able to use the features of VR correctly. Masterfully verified gameplay, excellent responsiveness, excellent soundtrack and style. Roman - you are a talent, continue in the same spirit, I will support you.
review_3: A super addictive runner with heaps of well-executed gameplay mechanics that kept me coming back for more. Big thanks to the dev for providing 2 codes to giveaway in my best of App Lab video: https://youtu.be/ZNFV4r8MAYw
review_4: You will be amazed how a game can take up so little room on your Quest and yet have more depth than most of your library. Try the free demo, and come back for the rest! :) Also I recommend turning jump settings to head position if you are having trouble with wild jumps. The hand position jumps (default) offer more freedom, but can be difficult to master. Personally, I prefer having this setting on head position. Menu/UI took me a minute to figure out, and it also took me a bit to figure out that I couldn't turn while holding onto the katana. Love the dancing tutorial man!
